SparkNotes Dark

Sparknotes is NOW DARK! 

Experience this wonderful site without your eyes bleeding.

*Note there may be places incorrectly colored, just leave feedback and I will fix it!*

data.name: Squiz Jira subtle internal comments
data.description: Make internal comments grey when collapsed, and also the "Squiz Internal" red text.

data.name: Bloc (Thinkful) Dark Theme
data.description: A dark theme for the various Bloc pages. The standard is too bright for my taste. I've used a 5 color theme for the most part, but everything is set up using variables, so you can change the colors to your taste. Click Customize Settings above to choose different colors. It's a work in progress, so let me know if you see any issues. Originally based on Thinkful Courses Dark (https://userstyles.org/styles/166064/thinkful-courses-dark).

data.name: Отключение анимации и изменение чата в Ligmar
data.description:
- Отключение лишней анимации в кузнице, алтаре, академии и при переходах. 
- Создание удобного чата.
- Кнопка выхода из гильдии теперь сверху.
- Текст можно выделять.

data.name: Mlp pornovirus patch for joyreactor
data.description: Makes green nicknames normal, making reactor less annoying to browse.

data.name: Blue Lolzteam
FurAffinity - PlumeTweaks™
data.description:
I was annoyed at the style of FurAffinity. Especially due to the fact the "beta" never evolved.
So I made this theme, which at first started as a small CSS to make profiles more readable.

user.name: Plume
user.about: Hello! ♪ I'm just an inexperienced person who loves to toy with CSS sometimes™. I recommend using Stylus over Stylish, if you care about your privacy. My styles aren't copies. I used to own the account named "Cuteness-Overlord" but lost both the password and the mail I used to create it. So, "I'm screwed.", as this website says.
